description: Uniform Manifold Approximation and Projection: Calculates nonlinear dimension reduction on a data set.
name: umap

properties.name: init
properties.description: Type of initialization for the coordinates

properties.name: scale
properties.description: Type of scaling to apply to data

properties.name: spread
properties.description: The effective scale of embedded points. In combination with min_dist, this determines how clustered/clumped the embedded points are

properties.name: min_dist
properties.description: The effective minimum distance between embedded points

properties.name: pca
properties.description: If set to a positive integer value, reduce data to this number of columns using PCA

properties.name: prop.train
properties.description: Proportion of data used to train the model. The rest of the data will be transformed. Default is 1 (all data is used).

properties.name: seed
properties.description: Seed for random number generation. if less than 0, set a Random seed
